alert.note: Alert for Maui Central Valley North (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Warning issued December 20 at 3:31AM HST until December 21 at 6:00PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... .Surf will remain extra large through Wednesday. ...HIGH SURF WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Dangerously large breaking waves of 30 to 40 feet. * WHERE...Maui Central Valley North. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Very High...Expect very strong breaking waves and powerful currents leading to the potential for impacts to coastal properties, infrastructure, and vulnerable coastal roadways. Powerful longshore and rip currents will be present at most beaches. Waves breaking in channel entrances may make navigating the channels dangerous.
info.instruction: Stay away from the shoreline along the affected coasts. Be prepared for road closures. Postpone entering or leaving channels affected by the high surf until the surf subsides.
